title: how can I fetch the result of output's Blobs_namet after  I sum two numpy array via brew.sum
body_html:
for example:
data1=np.random.randint(20,size=(2,3)).astype(np.int32)
data2=np.random.randint(20,size=(2,3)).astype(np.int32)
workspace.FeedBlob('data1',data1)
workspace.FeedBlob('data2',data2)
model=model_helper.ModelHelper(name="sumsum")
data3=brew.sum(model,['data1','data2'],"data3")
when I print the type of data3,it will tell me data3 is the BlobReference.But when I want to find the BlobReference name in the workspace.Blobs(), I don't find the data3 in it.
WHY???and I want to know how can i inspect the result of sum

body:
for example:
data1=np.random.randint(20,size=(2,3)).astype(np.int32)
data2=np.random.randint(20,size=(2,3)).astype(np.int32)
workspace.FeedBlob('data1',data1)
workspace.FeedBlob('data2',data2)
model=model_helper.ModelHelper(name="sumsum")
data3=brew.sum(model,['data1','data2'],"data3")
when I print the type of data3,it will tell me data3 is the BlobReference.But when I want to find the BlobReference name in the  workspace.Blobs(), I don't find the data3 in it. 
WHY???and I want to know how can i inspect the result of sum
